dr.matrix
Interface MutableMatrix

All Superinterfaces:
Matrix
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteMatrix, MutableMatrix.AbstractMutableMatrix
public interface MutableMatrix
extends Matrix

An inteface for a mutable matrix.

Version:
$Id: MutableMatrix.java,v 1.3 2005/05/24 20:26:01 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut
